Demographics (2020) White Black Native Asian 58.3% 1.9% 0.3% 31.1% Islander Other Mixed Hispanic (any race) 0.01% 2.6% 5.7% 7.4% Lincolnwood is a village in Cook County, Illinois in the United States. In 2020 the population was 13,463. It shares its southern, eastern, and a small section of its western boundary with Chicago, also bordering Skokie to the north and west. == References == Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago
title: Lincolnwood, Illinois
